client

Class DrawControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • client.DrawControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DrawControl
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A JPanel that handles any drawing functions.
    An array list of Shape objects is used to store the image.
    Options for Shape are shape/fill/coordinates/color.
    Uses mouse input, click 1 to activate, click 2 to place shape
    Version:
    0.9, 10/15/15
    Author:
    tdowd
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
